questions.quote: You know, I can't believe you put your money in that Sendrax. And you could've invested in my roll-out tie dispenser.
So you heard that I was in a car accident, and then decided to stop off for some Jujyfruit?
Who's dressing you?  You look like a complete idiot! You know, I wouldn't wipe my-  AAHHHH!!!!!
So then I drive all the way up to the country club and then I find out they got a tournament goin' on. Do you mind if I smoke?
The remote, the remote, I can't find the remote. Did I lost, I lost it. Did you take it? Did you put it some place?
No, last one. Listen, you gotta help me out. Elaine and Puddy just broke up, he's treatin' me just like a regular customer, now!
What about you, shmoopy? How 'bout a little tuna? You want a little tuna fishy?
You've got your degree. They don't care. They just want to see something.
Ahan, Ahan....yeah...Euh but, Why is it that the, that the animals enjoy reading the email?
Oh, please don't tell me you love me again, Jerry, I can't handle it.
